item.tgears.bar_of_blazing_chocolate.too: _Superhigh Calorie_ food, which is the Blaze love best!
item.tgears.blazing_chocolate_bucket.too: _Superhigh Calorie_ liquid, which is the Blaze love best!
item.tgears.blazing_chocolate_hand.toolt: Be careful not to eat Andesite Alloy!
item.tgears.chocolate_hand.tooltip.summa: Be careful not to eat Andesite Alloy!
item.tgears.hand_cast_with_blazing_choco: Hand Gold Cast with Blazing Chocolate Hand
item.tgears.hand_cast_with_brass_hand: Hand Gold Cast with Brass Hand
item.tgears.hand_cast_with_chocolate_han: Hand Gold Cast with Chocolate Hand
item.tgears.propeller_cast_with_cobalt_p: Propeller Gold Cast with Cobalt Propeller
item.tgears.whisk_cast_to_sturdy_whisk: Whisk Gold Cast with Incomplete Sturdy Whisk
item.tgears.whisk_cast_with_sturdy_whisk: Whisk Gold Cast with Sturdy Whisk
material.tgears.rose_quartz.encyclopedia: A unique crystal with a sharp quality.
modifier.tgears.cardboard.description: No damage can be done, but there is a knockback bonus.
modifier.tgears.diving_weights.descripti: Wielder descends more quickly in liquids. Grants the ability to walk and jump underwater. Wielder also is no longer affected by Mechanical Belts.
modifier.tgears.polished.description: Get a durability shield and damage bonus!
modifier.tgears.sharpness.description: Tool is so much sharper, dealing more damage!
tgears.ponder.basic_melter.text_2: Need a heater to provide heat
tgears.ponder.basic_melter.text_3: You still add some fuel to start the smeltery
tgears.ponder.basic_melter.text_4: Or you can use fuel tank
tgears.ponder.basic_melter.text_5: Also, don't forget to add fuel like lava
tgears.ponder.basic_melter_burner.header: Use the Blaze Burner to heat
tgears.ponder.basic_melter_burner.text_1: This is also a correct structure
tgears.ponder.basic_melter_burner.text_2: Provide 400째C temperature and half the rate when extinguished
tgears.ponder.basic_melter_burner.text_3: Provide 800째C temperature and normal rate when kindled
tgears.ponder.basic_melter_burner.text_4: Provide 1600째C temperature and double the rate when seething
tgears.ponder.basic_melter_pipe.text_1: Besides the Faucets, you can also use the Pipe for casting
tgears.ponder.basic_melter_pipe.text_2: The pipe will transport the fluid to the casting container
tgears.ponder.basic_melter_spout.text_1: The table is actually a fluid container
tgears.ponder.basic_melter_spout.text_2: So spout can be used to cast
tgears.ponder.new_foundry.text_1:
The bottom consists of a maximum of 16x16
Rectangular Scorched Bricks composition
tgears.ponder.new_foundry.text_2:
Put the second layer in any direction
Foundry Controller
Fuel Tank
Scorched Drain
tgears.ponder.new_foundry.text_6:
The rest of the surface we fill with bricks
At the same time, put faucet in front of drain.
tgears.ponder.new_foundry.text_7: In addition, we can also use bricks to continue to build high.
tgears.ponder.new_foundry.text_8: Finally, remember to import fuel to Fuel Tank
tgears.ponder.new_smeltery.text_1:
The bottom consists of a maximum of 11x11
Rectangular Seared Bricks composition
tgears.ponder.new_smeltery.text_2:
Put the second layer in any direction
Fuel Tank
Smeltery Controller
Seared Drain
tgears.ponder.new_smeltery.text_6:
The rest of the surface we fill with bricks
At the same time, put faucet in front of drain.
tgears.ponder.new_smeltery.text_7: In addition, we can also use bricks to continue to build high.
tgears.ponder.new_smeltery.text_8: Finally, remember to import fuel to Fuel Tank
tgears.ponder.smeltery_mini.text_1: It may not be economical, but it is interesting
tgears.ponder.smeltery_transfer.text_1: The chute can transport items to the smeltery
tgears.ponder.table_cooling.text_2: Acceleration is related to rotational speed of the fan
tgears.ponder.tag.smeltery.description: Tinker's components used to smelting and casting
tgears.ponder.tinker_drill.header: Use Tinker Drills to break blocks
tgears.ponder.tinker_drill.text_1: Tinker drills and ordinary drills have the same function, while their stress consumption is only half that of the latter
tgears.ponder.tinker_drill.text_2: Tinker drills can be upgraded to drill with the Silk Touch
tgears.ponder.tinker_fan.header: Use tinker fans to ave stress
tgears.ponder.tinker_fan.text_1: Tinker fans and ordinary fans have the same function, while their stress consumption is only half that of the latter
tgears.ponder.tinker_fortune_drill.heade: Use Fortune Tinker Drills to yield more drops
tgears.ponder.tinker_fortune_drill.text_: Fortune Tinker Drills can break blocks with a chance to yield more drops, functioning just like the Fortune Enchantment
tgears.ponder.tinker_spout.text_1: Tinker spouts can be controlled by signal
